pr_title: Aggregate and include all available attestations in blocks

timeline.message: Switch Bitlist to use BitSet as a backing.
Combine all signatures at once once attestations to include have been selected.
Streams are simpler than iterators in AggregatingAttestationPool.
Handle all requirements for including attestations in blocks.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into aggregator
Switch Bitlist to use BitSet as a backing.
Add more tests for bitlist and a benchmark.
Undo changes to Attestation and AttestationData.

Send attestations to AttestationAggregator when not using separate validator client.
Copy bitlist of first attestation in AggregateAttestationBuilder to avoid corrupting the attestation.
Add tests for MatchingDataAttestationGroup and omit attestations that have already had all their validators included.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into aggregator

Remove attestations which are a subset of any attestation being removed.
Fix Signature equals and hashCode to work with invalid signatures.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into aggregator

# Conflicts:
#	ethereum/statetransition/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/statetransition/BlockAttestationsPool.java
#	ethereum/statetransition/src/test/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/statetransition/BlockAttestationsPoolTest.java
#	ssz/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/util/SSZTypes/Bitlist.java
#	ssz/src/test/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/util/ssztypes/BitlistTest.java
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into aggregator
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into aggregator

timeline.bodyText: Is there no need to copy the signature here? If two attestations refer to the same signature and one is aggregated whilst the other is not, this might cause issues.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: BLSSignature and all the values it holds are now fully immutable so no need to copy them anywhere. 🎉
replies.author: ajsutton

timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Good idea.  I've added a bunch of comments for the classes to help explain what's going on.  Generally tried to keep them at an architectural level rather than being too specific about the details though.  I'm sure the words could be better but they'll have to do...
replies.author: ajsutton

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/ethereum/statetransition/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/statetransition/attestation/MatchingDataAttestationGroup.java b/ethereum/statetransition/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/statetransition/attestation/MatchingDataAttestationGroup.java index 80c3000693..9d1d1f4c23 100644 --- a/ethereum/statetransition/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/statetransition/attestation/MatchingDataAttestationGroup.java +++ b/ethereum/statetransition/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/artemis/statetransition/attestation/MatchingDataAttestationGroup.java @@ -26,6 +26,18 @@ import java.util.stream.StreamSupport; import tech.pegasys.artemis.datastructures.operations.Attestation; import tech.pegasys.artemis.datastructures.operations.AttestationData; +/** + * Maintains an aggregated collection of attestations which all share the same {@link + * AttestationData}. + * + *

So that the added attestations can be aggregated into the smallest number of aggregates, even + * as the contents of the collection change, aggregation is actually done during iteration. + * Aggregation starts with the attestation that already includes the most validators then continues + * adding attestations in order of the number of validators they contain. + * + *

Note that the resulting aggregate will be invalid if attestations with different + * AttestationData are added. + */ class MatchingDataAttestationGroup implements Iterable { private final NavigableMap> attestationsByValidatorCount =

timeline.author: cemozerr

timeline.message: Merge branch 'aggregator' of github.com:ajsutton/teku into aggregator
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into aggregator
